title: California National Historic Trail: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions         Donner Spring is far into the Utah backcountry. For emigrants this spring often meant the difference between life and death after crossing the 90-mile waterless Utah desert.
